user_query: in here [Music] what are you doing here what am i doing aren't you conducting not today no playing the drum i am it's what i do [Music] never said i was conducting that your mother said you were conducting and composing and doing your music it's percussion it suits me just fine but the drum it's low pressure and i enjoy it everybody said that you you had a talent you had a future truth is i was never quite good enough all that education and now you're disappointed i'm not disappointed but you obviously are no no it's not that i didn't say that nobody wants to employ me to do that professionally well i i guess i'm just saying it's never too late you could be it was going to have happened and would have happened by now well i thought we could spend a couple of days together i did i fly to europe this evening i'm sorry dad uh well i went to see david in new york was he still the same address i think so robert come on don't smoke anyway you used to smoke your mother made me stop too mom used to say make your dad proud it's not true i can feel it have your cigarette you need it now you know what i quit anyway you sounded good on the drums it's good it sounded very good thanks we don't see each other very often i i wasn't trying you just gave up smoking you're going to be a little edgy i'm sorry no i'm sorry hey i'm sorry that we couldn't spend more time together [Music] he arrives in vegas at ten tomorrow morning okay spend some time with him free tonight and tomorrow but i just
